message: This is my first offer. I propose we divide the money 700000 for me and 300000 for you.
I'll give you 400,000, but I think I deserve more
I've decided to adjust our proposal. My offer now is for you to receive 400000 and I take 600000. Let's see if this is acceptable.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the majority
I've decided to increase the amount I'm offering you to 550,000 and I'll keep 450,000 for myself. I believe this is fair given the current situation.
